name: Fall Of Aeternum
description:
Fall of Aeternum, the long awaited horror/puzzle game is now here! Featuring a series of intense and challenging levels to progress, with some darker elements along the way... There are also 3 different endings to this game!

Controls:

  • WASD - Move
  • Space Bar - Jump
  • E - Pickup / Drop objects
  • Q - Push heavy objects
  •  Z - Pull heavy objects
  • Esc - Pause

Developer Credits:

Producer/Level & Sound Designer - Keenan Simpson

3D Environment Artist - Zach Hasan

Gameplay Programmer - Klaus Mosnegutu

Programmer - Lewis Barron

Special thanks to Gianni Matragrano for the Narration
